pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/galaxy-containers.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/galaxy-containers/Overview--------The Galaxy_ containers module - interfaces for modeling and interacting with container backends (docker and docker swarm currently).* Free software: Academic Free License version 3.0* Code: https://github.com/galaxyproject/galaxy.. _Galaxy: http://galaxyproject.org/History-------.. to_doc---------------------21.1.1.dev0------------------------------------------21.1.0 (2021-03-19)---------------------* First release from the 21.01 branch of Galaxy.---------------------20.5.0 (2020-07-04)---------------------* First release from the 20.05 branch of Galaxy.---------------------19.9.0 (2019-12-16)---------------------* Initial import from dev branch of Galaxy during 19.09 development cycle.
